languages.text: Drukhari and Aeldari melee weapons damage scales with AGI instead of STR if its higher

traits.locale_text: Drukhari and Aeldari melee weapons damage scales with AGI instead of STR if its higher

languages.text: When this character uses Drukhari or Aeldari melee weapons, weapon damage is calculated using their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} if Agility is greater.

traits.locale_text: When this character uses Drukhari or Aeldari melee weapons, weapon damage is calculated using their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, if it is greater.

When this character uses Drukhari or Aeldari melee weapons, weapon damage is calculated using their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} if Agility is greater.

When this character uses Drukhari or Aeldari melee weapons, weapon damage is calculated using their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} if Agility is greater.

languages.text: このキャラクターはデュカーリまたはアエルダリの近接武器を使用する場合、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}より{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}が高ければ、武器ダメージはAGIで算出される。
languages.original_text: When this character uses Drukhari or Aeldari melee weapons, weapon damage is calculated using their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, if it is greater.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターはデュカーリまたはアエルダリの近接武器を使用する場合、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}より{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}が高ければ、武器ダメージはAGIで算出される。

languages.text: Когда персонаж использует друкарское или эльдарское оружие ближнего боя, для расчета урона от оружия используется {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g}, а не {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g}, если значение Ловкости выше.
languages.original_text: When this character uses Drukhari or Aeldari melee weapons, weapon damage is calculated using their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, if it is greater.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж использует друкарское или эльдарское оружие ближнего боя, для расчета урона от оружия используется {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g}, а не {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g}, если ее показатель выше.

Когда персонаж использует друкарское или эльдарское оружие ближнего боя, для расчета урона от оружия используется {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g}, а не {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g}, если ее показатель выше.

languages.text: Setzt dieser Charakter Drukhari- oder Aeldari-Nahkampfwaffen ein, wird der Waffenschaden mit ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} (anstelle der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke){/g} berechnet, wenn die Beweglichkeit höher ist.
languages.original_text: When this character uses Drukhari or Aeldari melee weapons, weapon damage is calculated using their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} if Agility is greater.

traits.locale_text: Setzt dieser Charakter Drukhari- oder Aeldari-Nahkampfwaffen ein, wird der Waffenschaden mit ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} (anstelle der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke){/g} berechnet, wenn die Beweglichkeit höher ist.

languages.text: Cuando este personaje usa un arma cuerpo a cuerpo Drukhari o Aeldari, si su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} es mayor que su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, la usa para calcular el daño de armas.
languages.original_text: When this character uses Drukhari or Aeldari melee weapons, weapon damage is calculated using their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} if Agility is greater.

traits.locale_text: Cuando este personaje usa un arma cuerpo a cuerpo Drukhari o Aeldari, si su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} es mayor que su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}, la usa para calcular el daño de armas.

languages.text: 当此角色使用黑暗灵族或艾达灵族近战武器时，如果此角色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}属性高于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}属性，则不在按照力量计算武器伤害，改为按照敏捷计算。
languages.original_text: When this character uses Drukhari or Aeldari melee weapons, weapon damage is calculated using their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} if Agility is greater.

traits.locale_text: 当此角色使用黑暗灵族或艾达灵族近战武器时，如果此角色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}属性高于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}属性，则不在按照力量计算武器伤害，改为按照敏捷计算。

languages.text: Quand ce personnage utilise une arme de mêlée drukhari ou aeldari, ses dégâts sont calculés sur la base de son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} au lieu de sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, si la première est plus élevée.
languages.original_text: When this character uses Drukhari or Aeldari melee weapons, weapon damage is calculated using their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} if Agility is greater.

traits.locale_text: Quand ce personnage utilise une arme de mêlée drukhari ou aeldari, ses dégâts sont calculés sur la base de son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} au lieu de sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}, si la première est plus élevée.

languages.text: Bu karakter, Drukhari veya Aeldari yakın dövüş silahı kullandığında {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliği {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} niteliğinden yüksekse silah hasarı Kuvvet yerine Çeviklik niteliği kullanılarak hesaplanır.
languages.original_text: When this character uses Drukhari or Aeldari melee weapons, weapon damage is calculated using their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} if Agility is greater.

traits.locale_text: Bu karakter, Drukhari veya Aeldari yakın dövüş silahı kullandığında {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliği {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} niteliğinden yüksekse silah hasarı Kuvvet yerine Çeviklik niteliği kullanılarak hesaplanır.
